arts.ttl: Martin Odegaard points blame for Arsenal's brutal defeat to West Ham
arts.sum: Arsenal endured a tricky weekend after being defeated by West Ham having had a man sent off but captain Martin Odegaard is under no illusions where the fault for the reverse lies

arts.ttl: MOTD analysis: Potter's 'outstanding' West Ham dent Arsenal title hopes
arts.sum: Ex-England captain Alan Shearer digests West Ham's outstanding performance against Premier League title challengers Arsenal.

arts.ttl: “All clicked” | West Ham crush Gunners title hopes with superb win
arts.sum: West Ham crush Arsenal’s title hopes for a third year in a row with an immense 1-0 win. Although they’re far from our main rivals, there’s perhaps no team that is more satisfying to beat than Arsenal. Their fans meltdown, Arteta pulls out every excuse that he can, and it always results in some quality... The post “All clicked” | West Ham crush Gunners title hopes with superb win appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Arsenal's Myles Lewis-Skelly breaks unwanted Premier League record as Mikel Arteta reacts to West Ham red card
arts.sum: Arsenal's Myles Lewis-Skelly sets an unwanted Premier League record with his red card in Saturday's disheartening 1-0 defeat to West Ham United at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta points the blame after Arsenal boss called out following West Ham defeat
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal were beaten at home by West Ham for the second straight Premier League match as the Gunners' hopes of winning the title were dealt as massive blow

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta called out for 'mind-blowing' Arsenal decision after West Ham defeat
arts.sum: Arsenal fell to defeat against West Ham as they struggled without a striker and Paul Merson is very concerned with where it leaves the Gunners for the remainder of the season

arts.ttl: After losing to West Ham, is Arsenal's title race now over?
arts.sum: Arsenal had a chance to eat into Liverpool's lead in the title race, but instead of ratcheting up the pressure, the Gunners crumbled vs. West Ham.

arts.ttl: Arsenal ‘deserve’ to feel pain as West Ham deal huge title race blow
arts.sum: Arsenal’s hopes of catching Liverpool were dealt a huge blow as West Ham won 1-0 at the Emirates

arts.ttl: Arsenal: Ethan Nwaneri injury update issued by "very angry" Mikel Arteta after West Ham defeat
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta is hopeful that Ethan Nwaneri did not suffer a serious injury in Saturday's dismal 1-0 Premier League defeat to West Ham United.

arts.ttl: Arsenal captain Odegaard delivers honest verdict following West Ham defeat
arts.sum: Arsenal were “not good enough” to avoid defeat against West Ham United in the Premier League, according to club captain Martin Odegaard. The midfielder made the honest admission after the north London outfit fell to a Jarrod Bowen goal on the stroke of halftime at the Emirates Stadium.
